name: Registration - 3
description: Standard registration of email address and password. Verify email and enroll the email address as an MFA method.  ToS capture.

sktemplate.name: Terms of Service
sktemplate.inputSchema:
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "agreementTitle": {
            "type": "string",
            "displayName": "Agreement Title",
            "propertyName": "agreementTitle",
            "preferredControlType": "textField",
            "label": "agreementTitle",
            "enableParameters": true,
            "value": "Agreement Title"
        },
        "agreementText": {
            "type": "string",
            "displayName": "Agreement Text",
            "propertyName": "agreementText",
            "preferredControlType": "textField",
            "label": "agreementText",
            "enableParameters": true,
            "value": "Agreement Text"
        },
        "agreementAcceptCheckboxText": {
            "type": "string",
            "displayName": "Agreement Accept Text",
            "propertyName": "agreementAcceptCheckboxText",
            "preferredControlType": "textField",
            "label": "agreementAcceptCheckboxText",
            "enableParameters": true,
            "value": "Agreement Accept Checkbox Text"
        },
        "agreementDeclineButtonText": {
            "type": "string",
            "displayName": "Agreement Decline Text",
            "propertyName": "agreementDeclineButtonText",
            "preferredControlType": "textField",
            "label": "agreementDeclineButtonText",
            "enableParameters": true,
            "value": "Agreement Decline Button Text"
        }
    }
}
